name: bnomei/kirby3-janitor
description: Kirby 3 Plugin for running jobs like cleaning the cache from within the Panel, PHP code or a cronjob

scripts.build: composer update; composer dumpautoload -o; yarn run build;
scripts.zip: rm kirby3-janitor.zip; composer update; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; yarn run build; zip -r kirby3-janitor.zip . -x *.git* -x *.gif* -x node_modules/\*; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
